about_the_game:
An intriguing and challenging game comes to life under the title "Frog Box." This captivating puzzle game invites players to dive into a charming world where a friendly frog is the protagonist. The mission? Push boxes to form lines of three or more matching boxes and clear the board.



Game Mechanics
In "Frog Box," you take on the role of a clever frog, equipped with the ability to push boxes on a board filled with natural elements. The main goal is to align three or more boxes of the same color to remove them and clear the board. As the boxes disappear, the frog progresses to new levels where the challenges become more complex.



The levels are designed with a variety of natural elements such as fallen logs, rocks, and streams that affect the movement of the boxes and the frog's path. These elements are not just obstacles but also tools you can use to solve puzzles creatively. For example, a log might serve as a temporary support to push a box to the desired location.



Challenges and Strategies
As the game advances, the challenges become more intricate. Different colored boxes may appear, and the arrangement of natural obstacles requires you to think strategically about each move.

Each level is a new opportunity to test your reasoning and planning skills. The game offers an accessible learning curve but also challenges experienced players to develop complex strategies to overcome obstacles and complete the puzzles.

name: Frog Box

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In "Frog Box," help a frog push boxes to form lines of three or more matching ones to clear the board. Explore challenging levels with natural obstacles like logs and streams that affect the movement of the boxes.
